tool_description: Get live currency exchange rates and convert between currencies.
name: Currency Exchange Rates
title: Currency Exchange Rates

api_list.name: exchangeRates
api_list.description: Get live exchange rates for all currencies.

api_list.name: listCurrencies
api_list.description: Get a list of available currencies.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-exchange-rates5.p.rapidapi.com/list.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-exchange-rates5.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: convertCurrency
api_list.description: Convert a specific amount from one currency to another.
